channel.title: [317] help with a few items [317]
channel.description:
Ok these are my problems 1: when i try to change the client name to mine in the gui.java and the client.java in client files i save and i compile and it comes up with Note: Some inpute files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details Press any key to continue. . . .
2: i also need help with making npcs talk above there head
3: How to make pk areas and safe zones
If you could help with these problems it would realy be great!

item.title: [317] help with a few items [317]
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

  1. Go to Npchandler.java

Search for:

npcs[i].textUpdate =

U see some npc id with this code

if (npcs[i].npcType == (ID)) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your Text Here!"; }

If u dont got this search for

				annoyNpcs(i);

and under it add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == (NpcID)) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your Text Here!"; } }

Hope i helped if u got problem post it

Read full topic

item.title: [317] help with a few items [317]
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Note: Some inpute files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details Press any key to continue. . . . This means that some of your files use a Java method that has been changed in the version of java you are using. This isn’t a problem though, it has compiled succesfully.

For the talking, openup NpcHandler.java and search for “moo”. You should find the function that is used to make the cows say moo. It works the same for all other npc’s, just change ID and message.

For PK zones, open client.java and search for

public boolean isInWilderness

You should find a bunch of coordinates. Add the coordinates of your PK zone, save and compile.

Read full topic
